SEARCH
Package fr.uge.patchwork2

Class GraphicAlgorithm

java.lang.Object
fr.uge.patchwork2.GraphicAlgorithm
public class GraphicAlgorithm extends Object
From an ApplicationContext, stores informations about the overall size and proportions of graphical elements and some elements themselves. Basically represents the IO of the graphic mode with some game data processing algorithms Only one instance of this class must be used for a game.
Author:
Herv√© Nguyen and Gabriel Radoniaina

  • Method Details

    • action

      public boolean action(Player newPlayer, Player newOpponent, boolean tokenOneOnTwo)
      Do all necessary actions that happens during one turn for a player.
      Parameters:
      newPlayer - Current player who is playing
      newOpponent - Opponent
      tokenOneOnTwo - Boolean that specifies if the player 1's token is placed ON the player 2's
      Returns:
      tokenOneOnTwo for the next turn

    • drawTurnStartInfo

      public void drawTurnStartInfo(boolean tokenOneOnTwo)
      Draws all the necessary information for the start of a turn And waits the player to click on the continue button to continue
      Parameters:
      tokenOneOnTwo - true if and only if the time token of player 1 is ON player 2's

    • resetInfo

      public void resetInfo()
      Clears side player info window and redraw with current informations
